::Spears::

She was terrified and was having great difficulty in trying to hide 
it. She took her hands off her eyes and just looked down at her 
feet.  She reminded herself that as long as she didn't look out a 
window, she would be ok.  She took long, deep breaths and tried to 
calm herself down.
